description: Israel says the video - which the BBC has not verified - shows captives were taken to al-Shifa on 7 October.
maintext: "During IDF air strikes in the area, the Hamas terrorist who was holding Noa was killed and she was wounded in the air strike, but not a life-threatening injury. Noa was taken inside Shifa hospital, where she was murdered by another Hamas terrorist."
title: Israel says CCTV footage shows hostages were taken to Gaza hospital
